Class CombatCharacters

java.lang.Object
CombatCharacters
public class CombatCharacters extends Object
Represents an enemy character in the game with attributes such as name, type, health, and damage range. Provides functionality for rolling random damage and tracking death status.
Author:
Christ Khin

  • Constructor Details

    • CombatCharacters

      public CombatCharacters(String name, String charType, int health, int min, int max)
      Constructs a new combat character with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the character
      charType - the type/classification of the character
      health - the starting health value
      min - the minimum damage this character can deal
      max - the maximum damage this character can deal

    • rollDamage

      public int rollDamage()
      Rolls and returns a random damage value within the character's damage range.
      Returns:
      the damage dealt

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Returns:
      true if the character is marked as dead, false otherwise

      public void setDead(boolean isDead)
      Sets the death status of the character.
      Parameters:
